message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer!  $900,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for this product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to get a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $850,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
